member.name: MetadataTimeStamps
member.summary: The MetadataTimeStamps structure describes the blob format for the MF_CAPTURE_METADATA_FACEROITIMESTAMPS attribute.

member.name: MetadataTimeStamps.Flags
member.summary: Bitwise OR of the MF_METADATATIMESTAMPS_* flags.

member.name: MetadataTimeStamps.Device
member.summary: QPC time for the sample the face rectangle is derived from (in 100ns).

member.name: MetadataTimeStamps.Presentation
member.summary: PTS for the sample the face rectangle is derived from (in 100ns).
